sentence.text: Mutations in transcription initiation from RNA polymerase II promoter causes cerebral autosomal dominant arteriopathy with subcortical infarcts and leukoencephalopathy (transcription initiation from RNA polymerase II promoter), a hereditary cerebrovascular disease that leads to ischemic strokes and dementia, but in which migraine is often present, sometimes long before the onset of other symptoms.

entity.text: transcription initiation from RNA polymerase II promoter
transcription initiation from RNA polymerase II promoter
